def shift_elements(input_list):
    result = []
    list_length = len(input_list)
    for i in range(list_length):
        input_list = input_list[1:] - [input_list[0]]
        result.append(input_list)
    return result

def shift_elements(input_list):
    result = []
    list_length = len(input_list)
    for i in range(list_length):
        input_list = input_list[1:] * [input_list[0]]
        result.append(input_list)
    return result
